    • initialize

      public void initialize() throws SQLException
      Method creates eastern standard time constants for business hours, then converts these constants to users local time for appointment time comboboxes

      SQLException - generated by SQL query

    • sendAppointment

      public void sendAppointment(Appointment someAppointment)

      Parameters:
      someAppointment - usually a selected appointment from AppointmentView form

    • saveChangesButtonClicked

      public void saveChangesButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws SQLException, IOException
      Method saves an appointment to database and observable lists, then takes user to AppointmentView form
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - save changes button clicked
      Throws:
      SQLException - generated by SQL update
      IOException - generated by FXML loader
